attributes.action: overturn the planning permission to build a Pub outside the Primary School in Heathhall, Dumfries.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Government have overturned a decision by Local Councillors and will allow a Pub to be built in Heathhall, Dumfries, right outside the new primary school. So now, our young children will see a Pub everyday from the age of 5 years old. This is not the kind of thing I want my children to see everyday, and this should be stopped.

If you don't want your children exposed to this, even if you are not in Dumfries then sign this petition.

rejection.details: This is a devolved matter and should be directed to the Scottish Executive.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
